tool_description: Get Amazon Live Data - Fast and reliable - The best for dropshipping
name: Amazon Live Data
title: Amazon Live Data

api_list.name: Get Asin
api_list.description: This endpoint get data from Amazon ASIN. You have to select a supported locale (us, uk, de, fr, es, it).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/getasin/us/B07WDSD7G7"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-live-data.p.rapidapi.com/getasin/{locale}/{asin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-live-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
